channel.title: The only bad thing about forums
channel.description: You have to keep on refreshing the page to see what the other people type :mad: It's really annoying, especially if you're writing something, you can't just say hold up, if they're posting, they won't see what you're posting, and then he'll post before you and it messes up what you're doing :| I'm really just writing this out of boredom, I have nothing to do :(

item.title: The only bad thing about forums
item.dc:creator: @g00dg0d g00dg0d
item.description:
@g00dg0d wrote:

Why does it matter? It doesnt take that long (for me) to refresh the page.

Read full topic
item.source: The only bad thing about forums

item.title: The only bad thing about forums
item.dc:creator: @ninjasod ninjasod
item.description:
@ninjasod wrote:

solemn wishes:

used to be a message saying " a new post has been posted before yours, read it" got rid of it now i think.

I think its still there, but they still interupt you regardless

Read full topic
